# Full list of available APIs

## Account
* GetUserByName
* GetUserNameById
* GetUserIdByName
* GetUserInformationById
* GetUsersById
* GetUserRole

* GetHistoricalDayChart

* GetTop20
* GetOptionChainDates
* GetOptionChain
* GetOptionLevel1
* GetOptionLevel1WithGreek
* GetOptionDayChart
* GetEquiductLevel1

* SearchBonds
* GetBondScreenerFieldValues

* GetMutualFunds
* GetQuoddEod
* GetQuoddDelay

* GetFxRate
